base.name: BASH

base.notes: Commands are run with /bin/bash -c . Use quotes if you want to run multiple commands or shell features such as redirection or pipeline

options.name: Command
options.description: Command to run in BASH terminal

base.description: Execute a command in a BASH terminal. Useful to run a single command across all agents
